titleStmt.title: SII 7.439: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 439. (A.R. No. 226 of 1901). ON THE NORTH, WEST AND SOUTH WALLS OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE KADAMBANATHESVARA TEMPLE AT KADAMBARKOYIL, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiruvaḷar tiraḷpuyat tiṟunilavalaiya n=taṉ ma maṇikkoṟṟa veṇkuṭai niḻal kuvalaiyat tuyirkaḷaip peṟṟatāyiṉum peṇi maṟṟuḷa Aṟaikaḻalaraicar taṉ naṭiniḻa lotuṅka Uṟaipila virai malar cūṭa teriyal vikkalaṉṟaṉnoṭu varicilait taṭakkai mācāman=taraik kaṅkapāṭik kaḷattiṭainiṉṟun=tuṅkapattirai pukat turatti viṭṭa tāṅkarum peruvalit taṇṭu keṭat tākki mātaṇṭanāya
kaṉ cāmuṇṭarācaṉaicaṉaic ceṟṟavaṉ cirattiṉai yaṟu yaṉ tevi nākalaiyeṉṉuṉ tokaiyañcāyalai mukattoṭu mūkku veṟākkip pakaittetir mūṉṟām vicaiyiṉu paripavan=tirvateṉak karuti porupuṉaṟ kūṭalcaṅkamat tāhavamallaṉ makkaḷākiya vikkaṇan ciṅkaṇane n=tarai veṉṟaṭu tūci muṉviṭṭut taṉṟuṇai main=ta
run tānum pinnaṭut tirun=tu vaṭakaṭalena vakutta vattāṉainaiyaik kaṭakka lai ciṅkaṉaik koṭipaṭai munnar tūci veṅkaḷiṟṟoṭu n=tuṇittuk kecavattaṇṭanāyakaṉ tāṟkettaraiyan tiṇṭiṟal mārāyan ciṉappo pāṟkotai muvetti yeṉ ṟāttaṭu tuppi laneka cāman=ta raic ciṉnapiṉnañ ceytu piṉnavar mutaliyāṉa mutuvaṇa noṭa vi laḻintu ciṅkaṇa ṉoṭa Aṇṇalar mutaliṉa raṉaivarum Amarporp pa
ṇṇip pakaṭiḻiṉ toṭa naṇṇiya vāhavamallatu mavarkku muṉ noṭat ta kai koṇṭu Āṅkavar tāramu mavar kulataṉamuñ caṅkun toṅkalun=tāraiyum beriyum melakaṭampamum veṇcāmaraiyum cūkarakkoṭiyum makaratoraṇa namum puṭpakapiṭiyum porukaḷiṟ ṟiṭṭamum pāyparit tokaiyoṭum paṟittuc ceyoḷi vīraciṅkācaṉam pārtoḻa veṟi Eḻiltaru makuṭam veyn=tu kucaikoḷt tattumāpuravip pottappive
kovirājakesarivanmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīvirarājentra vatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuk kāliyūrkkoṭṭattup pulivalanāṭṭu veṇkaṟceri Uṭaiyar tirukkaṭampan=tuṟai Uṭaiyār Ādidāsaśaṇḍeśvararpakkal nāṅkaḷ poṉkoṇ llai pakiṭikku meṟkun teṉpāṟkellai
Ivvūrar Itdevarkku viṭṭa tiruvamurtupaṭṭikku vaṭakku lamāṉa kollainilattukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai pakiṭikkey pāyn=ta Ūṟṟukkālukku teṟku ru makappaṭṭa nīrnilamuṅ kollainilamum patinaṟucāṇ kolāṟ kuḻi Āyirattirunūṟu kāciriyamuṅ kiṇaṟum meṟku vāṇiyaneri
niṉṟum Innilattukku nīrkkiyn=tavaṇṇam pati lāka kolkalam vāykkāl kalli nīrpāyap peṟuvatākavum Ipparicu Emmi licain=ta tirukku Ādidāsaśaṇḍeśvararpakkal Araiyan ceyyapātamāṉa Ilāṟaiyaṉ Oṭukkiṉa te ṟpatiṉkaḻañcu Ippoṉp patiṉkaḻa
ñcum Ivvūrome yuṟakkoṇṭu nokkivan=ta cittāyam pañcavā
ram nīrvilaiy maṟṟu ttirukko perppaṭṭa Iṟaiyum I
vvūroṭum Iṟukkakkaṭave kr aiyadravyamum Iṟai
ttiraviyamum Aṟakkoṇ Iṟaiyiliyāka Oru kā
lāvatu mirukālaāvatu muk Idharmmam cantrādittavaṟ muṉ
pu niṉṟa Ūrome nilainiṟuttakkaṭae śvarare nittaṅ kuṉṟip poṉ maṉṟap
peṟuvatākavum maṉṟupāṭu Iṟuttum Idharmma tukku vi vāṉ kaṅ
kaiyiṭaik kumariyiṭaip pāpañ ce Oṭṭit tirukkaṭampantuṟai
Uṭaiyār Ādidāsaśaṇḍe ceytukuṭuttom pulivalanā
ṭṭu veṇkaṟceri Ūrom kaṟal pūti Ātittaṉ
veṅkaṭatti neḻuttu . Ippaṭi caṉ poṉ ṟa neḻuttu . Ippa
ṭi viṟṟukkuṭutteṉ neyyaāṟṟuppākka Ippaṭi viṟṟukkuṭutten kuḷattu
ḻān cen=taṉ perumā neḻuttu . Ippaṭi viṟ kka neḻuttu . Ippaṭi viṟṟukkuṭutte
ṉ Araiyan ceyyapātamāṉa Iṟai
Digital edition of SII 7.439 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
